result.title: How to ask for help regarding specific problems or one's approach on codeforces
result.content: Hello CF community! I have previously asked my doubts regarding the specific problem on my blog but turns out I was getting downvoted. So, I thought there must be something I was doing wrong. I am writing this to know how to ask one's doubt regarding specific problems and their approaches? Are there some guidelines or other threads where I should ask my doubts? Any help is appreciated. Thank you
